S04n387:5: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ||
S04n387:7: bhagavānāha–bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n387:8: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro'bhūvam |
S04n387:9: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā ||
S04n387:10: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat– kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā ?
S04n387:13: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā ||
S04n387:23: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat–bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne |
S04n387:29: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā ||
S04n387:30: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n387:31: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhūvam |
S04n387:32: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā ||
